(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
/(?i)Help_(?!en).{2,}_[^/]*/
/bad-json\.json$
/binlist/binlist-data\.csv$
/DiceMatcherUnitTest\.java$
/dirbuster/.*\.txt$
/discovery/predictable-filepaths/
/dns/
/encoder-default\.xml$
/fuzzdb/regex/.*\.txt$
/Messages_(?!en).{2,}_.*\.properties$
/Standalone default template\.kts$
/svndigger/.*\.txt$
/URI_SCHEMES/.*\.txt$
/UserAgent/
/wordlists-.*\.txt$
ignore$
\.(?i)png$
\.avi$
\.ico$
\.jar$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.odt$
\.pdf$
\.svg$
\.wav$
\.xpi$
\.zaplang$
^\.github/
^\Q.gitattributes\E$
^\QaddOns/wappalyzer/src/main/resources/org/zaproxy/zap/extension/wappalyzer/resources/apps.json\E$
^\QaddOns/pscanrulesBeta/src/test/java/org/zaproxy/zap/extension/pscanrulesBeta/XChromeLoggerDataInfoLeakScanRuleUnitTest.java\E$
^\QaddOns/pscanrules/src/test/java/org/zaproxy/zap/extension/pscanrules/ViewStateScanRuleUnitTest.java\E$
